articles.author: Ian Duncan, Lori Aratani
articles.title: Air India crash is first involving Boeing’s 787 Dreamliner - The Washington Post
articles.description: The crash could renew scrutiny of Boeing, which suffered a major blow to its reputation after 2018 and 2019 crashes involving its 737 Max planes.
articles.content:
The deadly Air India crash Thursday is the first involving Boeings 787, a fuel-efficient jet the manufacturer introduced in2011as the future of long-distance travel and dubbed the Dreamliner.
Boeing… [+6105 chars]

articles.author: John Schuhmann
articles.title: Finals Film Study: Pacers turn up defense late in Game 3 - NBA
articles.description: Indiana took advantage of timely stops in Game 3 vs. OKC to move within 2 wins of its first NBA title.
articles.content:
The Pacers load up on Shai Gilgeous-Alexander, who commits a game-high 6 of the Thunder's 19 turnovers in OKC's Game 3 loss.
